article_title: Home Away Sues Over California ‘Airbnb’ Law
article_text:
Travel-lodging site HomeAway Inc. said it has sued the city of San Francisco in an attempt to block a new law that restricts home rentals from going into effect.

HomeAway is requesting an injunction to prevent the city from enforcing its short-term rental ordinance, the company said Monday.

The lawsuit, filed with the U.S. District Court...
